thread.title: Steve Smith

author: Steve Smith
title: Steve Smith
text: Would higly recommend this service from Tyres on the Drive. Easy website helps you choose the correct tyres for your car showing lots of options. Once ordered you are contacted to confirm your order and Asked to confirm you have chosen the correct size and contact if you have any questions before the tyres are fitted. On the day you get an email saying what time your fitter is going to be there and the filter was on time and was very helpful and polite and after asking you to confirm that he had the tyres you requested he continued to fit your tyres and once he had completed the task asked you to confirm you were happy and sign to confirm he was on his way . Painless service and would highly recommend
